segments.text: My gaze is drawn to the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the "COOKIE JAR" and a plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture is all concentration, a true stealth mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl nearby is eagerly reaching up, clearly in on the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, her eyes fixed on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must be quite sneaky to be doing this right under an adult's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing similar things when I was young.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance on that stool seems incredibly precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But their focus is entirely on the sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught or fall off that unstable perch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent joy in this forbidden treat is almost infectious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a scene of pure, unadulterated mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
